        public void addMultimedia(Multimedia multimedia)
                   throws PiikDatabaseException
        Add a new multimedia content to the db
        Parameters:
        multimedia - content to add
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException - Thrown if multimedia or its primary key are null

      • removeMultimedia

        public void removeMultimedia(Multimedia multimedia)
                      throws PiikDatabaseException
        Function to remove the given multimedia from the database
        Parameters:
        multimedia - Multimedia to remove
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException - Thrown if multimedia or its primary key are null

      • getMultimedia

        public Multimedia getMultimedia(Multimedia multimedia)
                         throws PiikDatabaseException
        Function to return the multimedia from the database
        Parameters:
        multimedia - Given multimedia to search into database
        Returns:
        Returns the multimedia with all it's values if it exists, othwerwise it will return null
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException - Thrown if multimedia or its primary key are null

      • existsMultimedia

        public boolean existsMultimedia(Multimedia multimedia)
                         throws PiikDatabaseException
        Check if multimedia exists on the db
        Parameters:
        multimedia - Multimedia to be checked
        Returns:
        Returns the multimedia if it exists, othwerwise it will return null
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException - Thrown if multimedia or its primary key are null

      • numPostMultimedia

        public Long numPostMultimedia(Multimedia multimedia)
                       throws PiikDatabaseException
        Count the number of post which contains the given multimedia
        Parameters:
        multimedia - Multimedia we want to count
        Returns:
        Number of post containing multimedia
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException - Thrown if multimedia or its primary key are null

      • postWithMultimedia

        public List<Post> postWithMultimedia(Multimedia multimedia)
                              throws PiikDatabaseException
        Gets all post containing multimedia
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getImage

        public javafx.scene.image.Image getImage(Multimedia multimedia)
                                  throws PiikDatabaseException,
                                         PiikInvalidParameters
        Get the image from multimedia
        Parameters:
        multimedia - Multimedia that contains the information of the image
        Returns:
        the image of the multimedia
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException - Thrown if multimedia or its primary key are null
        PiikInvalidParameters - Thrown if the type of multimedia isn't an image
